question: When must federal elections be held?
possible_answers: A. Whenever the Prime Minister calls the election
C. When the MPs want a new Prime Minister
D. On the third Monday in October every four years following the most recent general election
main_question: When must federal elections be held?
answer: D. On the third Monday in October every four years following the most recent general election
explanatory_sentence: Under legislation passed by Parliament, federal elections must be held on the third Monday in October every four years following the most recent general election.
